p: The UV–vis reflectance spectrum of the (Bi 0.97Ta 0.03) 2O 3.06 pigment was compared with those for the commercially available orange pigments such as Bayferrox 960 and Bayferrox 4960 (Fe 2O 3–FeOOH, Ozeki Co., Ltd.), as shown in Figure 4 . The present (Bi 0.97Ta 0.03) 2O 3.06 pigment showed higher reflectance in the wavelength region of 580–850 nm corresponding to the yellow-red light as compared with the commercially available orange pigments. But unfortunately, the reflectance in the green light region (520–570 nm) was also higher than those of the commercial ones.
